name: Lady Jane

topics.topic_text: I could retrieve the caps from your caravan.
topics.response_text: But what about those nasty critters?

topics.topic_text: I was hired by the Garrets to track you down.
topics.response_text: In that case, I suppose you're here to collect. I apologize, but I simply do not have enough caps on me to cover the debt.

topics.topic_text: Perhaps there is something else of value you could put toward the debt?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I'm short 90 caps or so, but I have a few cartons of cigarettes and some sensor modules I could put toward my debt.

topics.topic_text: I've dealt with such things in the past.
topics.response_text: Very well, but please do be careful.
I haven't the time to speak to commoners such as yourself.

topics.topic_text: I'll be back later. Don't go running off anywhere.
topics.response_text: Where would I go? My caravan is lost and I haven't the caps to do much else.

topics.topic_text: Rodents of unusual size? I don't believe they exist.
topics.response_text: Oh I assure you, sir, they are very real and very large. Please do be careful.

topics.topic_text: I find it hard to believe you ran from the caravan without taking something.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I'm short 90 caps or so, but I have a few cartons of cigarettes and some sensor modules I could put toward my debt.

topics.topic_text: Just give me what you have on you and they might accept it knowing you're dead.
topics.response_text: Hey, you don't need to kill me. I'm going back to California to start over.

topics.topic_text: But then, I'd be a liar, and I hate liars. <Attack>
I suppose that might work. It'll take some convincing though.
topics.response_text: I swear they'll never see me again. After this experience, I want nothing to do with this hell hole.

topics.topic_text: Jane, I can tell you're lying through your teeth.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Damn. I didn't want to hand over all of my caps because I won't have enough to get home to California.

topics.topic_text: Jane, surely a lady of your stature has honor sufficient to pay her debts.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Oh you charming wonderful hunk of man. I agree, I cannot risk my reputation on such a paltry sum.

conversation.response_text: Excuse me, but a lady of my stature does not converse with those of low stock.

description:
Lady Jane is a 38 year-old Caucasian Female.

A weary trader with weathered skin and tired eyes, Lady Jane stands near the entrance to Freeside, just to the right of the gate leading to the New Vegas Strip. Her worn leather armor and patched clothing tell of a difficult life on the road. She carries a worn caravan ledger and keeps a close eye on her few remaining goods, always watching for potential threats in the dangerous wasteland.

Lady Jane's Personality: Cautious but not unfriendly, Lady Jane is pragmatic and resourceful. Years of hardship have made her wary of strangers but she maintains a professional demeanor when trading. She speaks with a hint of nostalgia for her California home and shows determination to one day return there, despite the odds against her.

Lady Jane's Backstory: Born and raised in the New California Republic, Lady Jane was part of a successful caravan trading family that operated between California and the Mojave Wasteland. In her early twenties, she took over the family business and expanded their routes, eventually establishing regular trade with the New Vegas area. However, disaster struck when her caravan was ambushed and raided in the Broc Flower Cave. The attack left her with most of her inventory destroyed and several of her guards dead. With her savings depleted and her business in ruins, Lady Jane has been struggling to rebuild in Freeside, working odd jobs and small trades while desperately trying to save enough caps to return to California.
